name: Barnacle Dash
description:
Summary

Avoid the rocks as your submarine travels to the underwater base.

Controls
  • Up or W to move up
  • Down or S to move down
  • R to restart
  • Esc to exit

Try to avoid barnacles as they will latch onto your submarine and slow down your maneuverability.

Credits

Music made with http://earslap.com/page/otomata.html
SFX made with https://www.bfxr.net/
Victory SFX found here https://opengameart.org/content/oldschool-win-and-die-jump-and-run-sounds

This game was made for Ludum Dare 40.
